titleStmt.title: An appendix to the late answer printed by His Majesties command, or, Some seasonable animadversions upon the late observator and his seaven anti-monarchicall assertions with a vindication of the King and some observations upon the two houses.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

titleStmt.title: An appendix to the late answer printed by His Majesties command, or, Some seasonable animadversions upon the late observator and his seaven anti-monarchicall assertions with a vindication of the King and some observations upon the two houses.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

With: Animadversions upon those notes which the late observator hath published upon the seven doctrines and positions which the King, by way of recapitulation (he saith) lays open so offensive p. 13 [i.e. 12]-22 [i.e.21]
